SEARCH
Package br.com.softwareexpress.sitef.android

Class CliSiTef

java.lang.Object
br.com.softwareexpress.sitef.android.CliSiTef
public final class CliSiTef extends Object
Classe para interface com a automação em ambiente Android.

Esta classe utiliza a JCliSiTefI e contém métodos novos para Android

    • CMD_CONFIRM_GO_BACK

      public static final int CMD_CONFIRM_GO_BACK
      Asks to confirm the "step back" request. The first character in Buffer must contain 0 to confirm or 1 to cancel.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CMD_CONFIRMATION

      public static final int CMD_CONFIRMATION
      Requests a confirmation (YES/NO). The first character in Buffer must contain 0 for yes or 1 for no.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CMD_GET_MENU_OPTION

      public static final int CMD_GET_MENU_OPTION
      Sends a list of options so the operator can select one item. On call, the parameter Buffer contains the options in the format: 1:text; 2:text;...i:text;... The application routine must present the options the way it desires (no need to include the index 1,2, ...). After the selection is done by the operator, the routine returns in Buffer the item i chosen by the operator (in ASCII).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CMD_PRESS_ANY_KEY

      public static final int CMD_PRESS_ANY_KEY
      Waits for the operator to press a key. This command is used so that the operator has to be warned about some message presented on the screen.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CMD_ABORT_REQUEST

      public static final int CMD_ABORT_REQUEST
      Asks the application if it wants to abort the data collecting process. This command is returned when the CliSiTef is accessing some peripheral device and allows the application to stop this access (for example: waiting for the swiping of the card in a card reader or the typing of the password by the client).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CMD_GET_FIELD_INTERNAL

      public static final int CMD_GET_FIELD_INTERNAL

  • Constructor Details

    • CliSiTef

      public CliSiTef(android.content.Context context)
      Cria uma instância da CliSiTefI. Uma vez criada, ela deve permanecer instanciada durante todo o ciclo de vida da aplicação (e não somente para cada transação).
      Parameters:
      context - Context que poderá receber eventos de pinpad.

    • CliSiTef

      public CliSiTef(android.content.Context context, @NonNull br.com.softwareexpress.sitef.android.statistics.IAnalytics analytics)

    • loadTranslationFile

      public int loadTranslationFile(String filename)
      Allows to dynamically load a set of messages for internationalization.
      Note: Some messages are originated from the server, and are not liable to translation.
      Parameters:
      filename - Name of the file to be loaded, containing the translated messages.
      This file must be present in the assets folder.
      Returns:
      0, In case of success.
      -10, Missing parameter.
      -20, Invalid parameter.
      Other negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • loadTranslationFile

      public int loadTranslationFile(String filename, String CieloFilename)
      Allows to dynamically load a set of messages for internationalization.
      Note: Some messages are originated from the server, and are not liable to translation.
      Parameters:
      filename - Name of the file to be loaded, containing the translated messages.
      This file must be present in the assets folder.
      CieloFilename - file conteing messages to be used with Cielo.
      This file must be present in the assets folder.
      Returns:
      0, In case of success.
      -10, Missing parameter.
      -20, Invalid parameter.
      Other negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • configure

      public int configure(String sitefIP, String storeID, String terminalID, String additionalParameters)
      Performs the initial clisitef setup, thus allowing to interact with the SiTef Server.

      The pair (storeID, terminalID) should uniquely identify the POS. The additionalParameters field allows the application to set up specific configurations of the CliSiTef. Those specific configurations are explained in the CliSiTef documentation.
      Parameters:
      sitefIP - The IP address or hostname of the SiTef Server.
      storeID - SiTef Store ID.
      terminalID - SiTef Terminal ID.
      additionalParameters - Additional Parameters used to set up specific configurations of the CliSiTef.
      Returns:
      0, OK.
      1, Invalid or unresolved IP Address.
      2, Invalid store ID.
      3, Invalid terminal ID.
      6, Tcp/Ip initialization error.
      7, Low memory.
      8, CliSiTef shared library not found, or it has problems.
      10, PinPad not properly configured in the configuration file CliSiTef.ini.

    • startTransaction

      public int startTransaction(ICliSiTefListener listener, int functionId, String trnAmount, String taxInvoiceNumber, String taxInvoiceDate, String taxInvoiceTime, String cashierOperator, String additionalParameters)
      Starts a transaction process.
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener that receives the transaction events.
      functionId - Type of transaction to be performed.
      trnAmount - It contains the amount to be paid with the decimal separator (","). Applications must always pass it with two decimal places after the comma (","). If no amount is specified (for instance, recharge of prepaid), this field must contain zero.
      taxInvoiceNumber - Tax Invoice Number used to identify the transaction. Must be unique.
      taxInvoiceDate - Tax Invoice Date in the format YYYYMMDD.
      taxInvoiceTime - Tax Invoice Time in the format HHMMSS.
      cashierOperator - Cashier Operator ID.
      additionalParameters - Additional Parameters used to narrow the payment forms of the transaction. This parameter format is explained in the CliSiTef documentation.
      Returns:
      0, OK. The transaction is approved, but in a PENDING state. Call finishTransaction to confirm or not the transaction.
      > 0, Denied by the authorizer with this value.
      -1, Module not initialized.
      -2, Operation aborted by the operator.
      -3, Invalid functionId.
      -4, Low memory to run the function.
      -5, No communication with SiTef server.
      -6, Operation aborted by the user.
      Other negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • abortTransaction

      public int abortTransaction(int continueStatus)
      Aborts the current transaction process.
      Returns:
      0, OK. The transaction will be aborted in background. Eventually it will trigger the events in ICliSiTefListener.
      -1, There is no transaction currently in progress.

    • continueTransaction

      public int continueTransaction(String data)
      Continues the current transaction process, using the data provided as input for the latest onData triggered event.
      Parameters:
      data - String containing the input for the latest onData triggered event.
      If the command on the latest onData is zero, then data can be set with an empty String ""
      Returns:
      0, OK. The transaction will be resumed with the data provided.
      -1, There is no transaction currently in progress.

    • finishTransaction

      @Deprecated public int finishTransaction(int confirm, String taxInvoiceNumber, String taxInvoiceDate, String taxInvoiceTime, String additionalParameters)
      Deprecated.
      use finishTransaction(ICliSiTefListener, int, String, String, String, String) instead
      Performs the settlement of a specific transaction.
      Parameters:
      confirm - True, to confirm the transaction; False, to cancel the transaction.
      taxInvoiceNumber - Tax Invoice Number used to identify the transaction, must be unique.
      taxInvoiceDate - Tax Invoice Date in the format YYYYMMDD.
      taxInvoiceTime - Tax Invoice Time in the format HHMMSS.
      additionalParameters - Additional parameters (check CliSiTef document: SiTef - Interface Simplificada com a aplicação)
      Returns:
      0, OK. The transaction is settled.
      > 0, Denied by the authorizer with this value.
      -1, Module not initialized.
      -2, Operation cancelled by the operator.
      -3, Invalid functionId.
      -4, Low memory to run the function.
      -5, No communication with SiTef server.
      -6, Operation cancelled by the user.
      Other negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • finishTransaction

      public int finishTransaction(ICliSiTefListener listener, int confirm, String taxInvoiceNumber, String taxInvoiceDate, String taxInvoiceTime, String additionalParameters)
      Performs the settlement of a specific transaction.
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener that receives the transaction events.
      confirm - True, to confirm the transaction; False, to cancel the transaction.
      taxInvoiceNumber - Tax Invoice Number used to identify the transaction, must be unique.
      taxInvoiceDate - Tax Invoice Date in the format YYYYMMDD.
      taxInvoiceTime - Tax Invoice Time in the format HHMMSS.
      additionalParameters - Additional parameters (check CliSiTef document: SiTef - Interface Simplificada com a aplicação)
      Returns:
      0, OK. The transaction is settled.
      > 0, Denied by the authorizer with this value.
      -1, Module not initialized.
      -2, Operation cancelled by the operator.
      -3, Invalid functionId.
      -4, Low memory to run the function.
      -5, No communication with SiTef server.
      -6, Operation cancelled by the user.
      Other negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • finishTransaction

      public int finishTransaction(int confirm) throws Exception
      Performs the settlement of the last transaction initiated.
      Parameters:
      confirm - True, to confirm the transaction; False, to cancel the transaction.
      Returns:
      0, OK. The transaction is settled.
      > 0, Denied by the authorizer with this value.
      -1, Module not initialized.
      -2, Operation cancelled by the operator.
      -3, Invalid functionId.
      -4, Low memory to run the function.
      -5, No communication with SiTef server.
      -6, Operation cancelled by the user.
      Other negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.
      Throws:
      Exception - if last transaction made is not found.

    • getQttPendingTransactions

      public int getQttPendingTransactions(String taxInvoiceDate, String taxInvoiceNumber) throws Exception
      Verify how many transactions were made in case of a blackout.
      Parameters:
      taxInvoiceDate - Invoice date (data fiscal)
      taxInvoiceNumber - Invoice number (cupom fiscal)
      Returns:
      The quantity of pending transactions.
      Throws:
      Exception - if no transaction was done previously.

    • getVersion

      public String getVersion() throws Exception
      Get the CliSiTef and CliSiTefI version.
      Returns:
      CliSiTef and CliSiTefI version, in the format "<CliSiTef version>/<CliSiTefI version>".
      Throws:
      Exception - if it was not possible to get the versions.

    • submitPendingMessages

      public int submitPendingMessages()
      During a connection problem with the SiTef server, the CliSiTef will send automatically the pending settlements and unmakings in the next transaction. But the POS can use this function to ask the CliSiTef to send then right away.
      Returns:
      0, OK.
      <> 0, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • setActivity

      public void setActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
      Sets the Activity that will show the virtual pinpad (only APOS with internal pinpad). The Activity is usually the one that calls startTransaction and gets the user input for the transaction. It is mandatory for the application to call this method before calling startTransaction . In case this does not happen, the the transaction will fail and return code 31 (pinpad error). We recommend calling this method in the Activity's onCreate method. This method only aplies to single screen terminals with internal pinpad, that is, terminals that need a virtual pinpad (e.g. Gertec GPOS700, Ingenico A8).
      Parameters:
      activity - application Activity that implements the transaction
